hero.badge: The New Standard in Employee Experience
hero.title: Make Listening Your
hero.subtitle: Move beyond simple surveys. Qualitivate connects the dots between employee feedback, quality culture, and business performance.

agitation.title: The Cost of Silence
agitation.subtitle: In a rapidly evolving workplace, missing the signal means missing the future. Disconnected teams lead to turnover, stagnation, and poor quality.
agitation.card1Desc: Workforce needs are shifting faster than ever. Annual surveys are no longer enough to keep up with the pace of change.
agitation.card2Desc: Data without action is just noise. When employees speak up but see no change, engagement plummets.
agitation.card3Desc: Quality isn't just an output; it's a culture. Disconnected departments create gaps where quality fails to thrive.

methodology.label: Our Methodology
methodology.title: A Smarter Way to Listen
methodology.step1Desc: Flexible NPS and Custom Surveys that adapt to your organizational hierarchy and cadence.
methodology.step2Desc: AI-Powered Analytics that separate noise from nuance, revealing the "why" behind the scores.
methodology.step3Desc: Turn passive feedback into active quality improvement initiatives with tracked outcomes.

benefits.title: Go deeper than
benefits.feat1Desc: Measure loyalty and sentiment at every levelâ€”from the frontline to the C-suite. Segment data by department, role, or tenure.
benefits.feat2Desc: Go beyond charts. Understand the human stories behind the data with deep drills-down and sentiment analysis.
benefits.feat3Desc: Empower department heads to own their quality culture. Share role-based dashboards that drive accountability.

cta.title: Ready to reimagine your
cta.subtitle: Join the organizations that are turning employee feedback into their strongest competitive asset.
